recently my attention has been captivated by the latest establishment situated at 1531 east blvd in charlotte nc here you have the opportunity to indulge in an abundant selection of more than fifteen flavors of chicken salad paired with irresistible desserts like hummingbird cake and cokeacola cake that evoke memories of homemade comfort food prepared by moms what sets this place apart is its globally recognized status earned through an appearance on the renowned food network where its famous buttered and grilled chicken served on a new england roll was showcased furthermore customers are provided with great value for these tantalizing culinary treasures
